Current page:  ECC
                                        
    		College of Engineering, Computer Science, and Construction Management
    	Tackling the Challenges of the 21st Century–and BeyondChico State’s College of Engineering, Computer Science, and Construction Management (ECC) has its sights set on tackling the challenges of the 21st century–and beyond. Faculty and staff in ECC are dedicated to providing the application-based curriculum and hands-on learning experiences necessary to prepare students for careers in a multitude of sectors in the engineering, computer science, computer animation and game development, construction management and concrete industry management.And with dozens student clubs and competition teams, students will be able to apply their knowledge and gain vital experience outside of the classroom as well.
                Give a Gift
    Apply to Chico StateWith one of the highest 4-year graduation rates in the CSU system and lowest average student debt amounts in the country, Chico State offers one of the nation’s highest return on investment.Apply to Chico StateDiscover More in the College of ECCOur ProgramsThis isn’t your typical large lecture hall type of education, we’re about rolling up our sleeves, getting our hands dirty, and learning by doing. Students enrolled in one of the College’s 11 undergraduate programs–and one graduate program– work directly with experts in their respective fields; scientists, engineers, business professionals, and on-the-job practitioners who are sharing first-hand knowledge and know-how with our students every single day.Undergraduate MajorsAdvanced Manufacturing and Applied RoboticsCivil EngineeringComputer Animation and Game DevelopmentComputer EngineeringComputer Information SystemsComputer ScienceConcrete Industry ManagementConstruction ManagementElectrical/Electronic EngineeringMechanical EngineeringMechatronic EngineeringGraduate MajorsComputer ScienceCollege of Engineering, Computer Science & Construction Management530-898-5963ecc@csuchico.eduwww.csuchico.edu/eccSupport our CollegeProgram PortfolioUndergraduate ProgramsAdvanced Manufacturing and Applied RoboticsComputer Animation & Game DevelopmentCivil EngineeringComputer Information SystemsComputer EngineeringComputer ScienceConcrete Industry ManagementConstruction ManagementElectrical/Electronic EngineeringMechanical EngineeringMechatronic EngineeringGraduate ProgramsMaster in Computer Science
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
